message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
I understand you want a larger share, so I'm proposing a compromise.  This offer ensures you get more than the last round, even with inflation.
I see you're willing to compromise, let's meet in the middle of our previous offers.
Time is running out, and we both lose if we don't agree soon. This offer is a reasonable middle ground to ensure we both benefit.
